item.title: How to use pgbench to test PostgreSQL® performance
item.description: Testing a database performance is a must in every company. Despite everyone’s needs beings slightly different, a good starting point for PostgreSQL® database is using pgbench: a tool shipped with the PostgreSQL installation that allows you to stress test a local or remote database. This blog post showcases how to install (on a Mac) and use pgbench to create load on a remote PostgreSQL database on Aiven.
